sentences.en: A number of tropical plants have been naturalized in China.
sentences.cn: 许多热带植物已经移植到中国.

sentences.en: A tropical cyclone brought heavy rain to the country last week.
sentences.cn: 上周一股热带气旋使该国受到暴雨袭击.

sentences.en: A tropical storm is gaining strength in the eastern Atlantic.
sentences.cn: 在大西洋东部，一场热带风暴的风力正逐渐增强。

sentences.en: August was almost tropical this year.
He has bought some tropical fruits.
The company is the world's largest destroyer of tropical forests.
sentences.cn: 该公司对热带雨林的破坏位居世界之首。

sentences.en: the searing heat of a tropical summer
The swimming pool is framed by tropical gardens.
sentences.cn: 泳池周围都是栽种热带花卉的花园。

sentences.en: The tropical climate did us in.
sentences.cn: 热带气候使我们都吃不消了.

sentences.en: This disease is widespread in tropical areas.
sentences.cn: 这种疾病在热带地区蔓延很广.

sentences.en: Tropical colours may look rather harsh in our dull northern light.
sentences.cn: 热带色彩在我们北方暗淡的光线下可能显得有点刺目。

sentences.en: tropical fruits, such as bananas and pineapples
sentences.cn: 热带水果，如香蕉和菠萝

sentences.en: Tropical rainforests have the most varied assemblage of plants in the world.
sentences.cn: 热带雨林集聚了世界上种类最繁多的植物。

sentences.en: Tropical storm Marco is pushing northward up Florida's coast.
sentences.cn: 热带风暴“马可”正沿佛罗里达海岸向北推进。

sentences.en: You must grow these tropical flowers in a glasshouse.
sentences.cn: 你必须把这些热带花卉种在温室里.

phrases.tran_cn: 热带森林，热带雨林；热带林
热带；热带区域；热带载重线区

trans.tran_cn: 热带的，来自热带的，典型热带气候的
trans.tran_en: coming from or existing in the hottest parts of the world
